entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 23 except 17 near Lake Ontario.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 23 except 17 near Lake Ontario. Humidex 26. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
